5367.quoteText:
Your right of access
You have the right to obtain a copy of all personal data that Fur Affinity holds about you, such as personal details or correspondence, generally, within a 30 day time limit and free of charge. You may limit the amount of data that you would like to obtain if you do not wish to access all of the records.

Requests for your right of access can be sent to myinfo@furaffinity.net.
  • Your right to move your data (portability)
    Under certain circumstances you can request that a data collector move your data to another service provider. This is not an automatic right, and because Fur Affinity provides unique Services, it may not be able to honor your right to data portability.

    Requests for your right of access can be sent to myinfo@furaffinity.net.
5367.title: This service provides a way for you to export your data

tosdr.case: This service provides a way for you to export your data

5662.quoteText: Fur Affinity reserves the right to enforce these terms via content removal (submissions, journals, comments, etc)

5663.quoteText: account suspension, and account termination at the discretion of its staff

5664.quoteText: In order to investigate claims and comply with local law enforcement, we reserve the right to monitor any communication using Fur Affinity as the medium.
5664.title: Your private content may be accessed by people working for the service

5665.quoteText: If for any reason, your account is suspended, banned, restricted, blocked (via users), or otherwise disabled by Fur Affinity, you agree to not create another account with the intent to bypass these limitations without our permission.
5665.title: Service does not allow alternative accounts

tosdr.case: Service does not allow alternative accounts

5666.quoteText:
Fur Affinity reserves the right to change these documents at any time, without prior notice, and for any reason.
You will be notified of these changes via site announcements.
Continued usage of the site after being notified constitutes acceptance and agreement with any changes.
5666.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

5668.quoteText:
By registering an account, you agree that you are at least thirteen (13) years of age in the US or are sixteen (16) if you are a resident of the EU. No individual under the age of thirteen (13) may register an account, use our services, provide any personal information to Fur Affinity, or otherwise upload or transmit personal information through our services (Name, address, telephone number, email address, etc).

In other words...
You must be a minimum of at least 13 years old to use this site. Due to various policies in the EU policy we require EU residents be at least 16 years or older.
5668.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age

5669.quoteText:
Our services may change without prior notice to you. We retain the right to create limits on our services at any time with or without notice. We may also impose limits on services or aspects of them or restrict your access to part or all of our services without notice or liability. We may change, suspend, or discontinue any or all of our services at any time, including availability of any product, feature, database, and content (yours or ours).

In other words...
If need be, we reserve the right to disable or remove features or even limit access to the site completely if need be. We try not to do this.

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

5670.quoteText: Fur Affinity's services are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We do not warranty our services or content (yours or ours). You release us from liability concerning
5670.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

5673.quoteText: We may track information that will be maintained, used and disclosed in aggregate form only and which will not contain your personally identifiable information. For example, we may collect IP addresses, browser type and cookie numbers. We may analyze this data for trends and statistics in the aggregate, and we may use such aggregate information to administer the Site, track users' movement, and gather broad demographic information for aggregate use.
5673.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

tosdr.case: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

5674.quoteText: You can read more about privacy and cookies set by DoubleClick by Google at https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies.
5674.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information

tosdr.case: The service refers users to external documents for more information

5675.quoteText: To register an account at Fur Affinity we request certain personal data from you on the registration form such as your username, password, email address, and date of birth.
5675.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

tosdr.case: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

5676.quoteText:
You have to right to request that Fur Affinity stop certain data processing activities that involve processing your personal data. This isn't an automatic right, and Fur Affinity's ability to restrict processing will depend on the type of data that for which you are making this request.

Requests for your personal information can be sent to stop@furaffinity.net.
  • You have a right request deletion
    You have a right to request that Fur Affinity delete your personal data that it holds. This isn't an automatic right, and what Fur Affinity is able to delete will depend on the type of data that we hold about you, whether it was obtained via consent, what purpose it serves, and whether Fur Affinity has an obligation to keep the data, among other things.
5676.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

5677.quoteText: Our computer systems and third party hosting provider systems are currently based in the United States and may be located in other countries, so your personal data will be processed by us in the U.S. and other countries where data protection and privacy regulations may not offer the same level of protection as in other parts of the world, such as the European Union. If you create a user account with the Site as a visitor from outside the United States, by using the Site you agree to this Privacy Policy and you consent to the transfer of all such information to the United States, which may not offer an equivalent level of protection of that required in the European Union or certain other countries, and to the processing of that information as described in this Privacy Policy.
5677.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

5678.quoteText:
Do not post links to content prohibited by Fur Affinity's policies.
If you are not permitted to upload or discuss the content on Fur Affinity, then do not link to it. Violating this rule may also result in citation under the site rule the content violates.

Mature/Adult links are prohibited on General-rated or public areas unless the content requires a login or age verification. This includes advertisements visible on the target URL.

Exemptions: AUP 2.8, 2.9, 4.1, 4.2, and others by staff discretion.

In other words...
Do not post comments or content which violate site rules. If it's against the rules it can not be linked, except in instances noted.
5678.title: Users agree not to submit illegal content

tosdr.case: Users agree not to submit illegal content

5679.quoteText:
These permissions do not transfer the rights of your content or allow us to create any deviations of that content outside the aforementioned purposes.

In other words...
By uploading your content to the site you give us permission to host and share it. You retain the copyright to your content.
5679.title: You maintain ownership of your data

tosdr.case: You maintain ownership of your data
